snippet: At an event called “The People’s Summit” in Chicago, Mr. Sanders’s backers discussed their plans to carry on his message and their intentions for the general election.
abstract: Sen Bernie Sanders's most ardent supporters are reluctant to switch their loyalties to Hillary Clinton; focus on building structure to press campaign's agenda regardless of who wins election; Sanders aides say candidate himself is pressuring Clinton to adopt some of his proposals in return for his endorsement.
lead_paragraph: At an event called “The People’s Summit” in Chicago, Mr. Sanders’s backers discussed their plans to carry on his message and their intentions for the general election.

headline.main: Bernie Sanders Die-Hards Gather and Try to Look Past November
headline.print_headline: Die-Hards for Sanders, Clinging to Their Ideals, Try to Look Past the Election
